attributes.action: To make all political parties  manifesto's legally binding once in office
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Make all political parties manifesto's legally binding once in office.
This petition asks that all political party manifesto's pledges to the voter should be carried out by law once elected to office.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
